sorcer.core.provider.cataloger.ui
Interface SignatureDispatchment

All Superinterfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
SignatureDispatcherForCataloger, SignatureDispatcherForProvider
public interface SignatureDispatchment
extends ActionListener

The Signature Dispatcher Interface allows us to abstract the interactions with cataloger or the provider. The two implementations of this interface are @link SignatureDispatcherForCataloger and @link SignatureDispatcherForCataloger each implementation handles obtaining the information requested by the model.

Author:
Greg McChensey

saveContext

Boolean saveContext(Context theContext)
Save a dataContext back to the network, saves the dataContext as the currently selected method name.

Parameters:
theContext - Context to be saved.
Returns:
Boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

saveContext

Boolean saveContext(String newName,
                    Context theContext)
Save the dataContext to the network, this stores the dataContext under the name provided in newName.

Parameters:
newName - String representing the name the dataContext should be saved as
theContext - Context to be saved.
Returns:
Boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

deleteContext

Boolean deleteContext(String methodName)
Delete a dataContext from the network, the dataContext to be deleted is defined by the String methodName.

Parameters:
methodName - String with the name of the dataContext to delete.
Returns:
Boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

exertService

Context exertService(Context theContext)
This method creates an exertion using the dataContext provided by the user. The results of the exertion are returned to the user.

Parameters:
theContext - Context to be sent with the exertion
Returns:
Context returned from the exertion.
